T02TD2770E:144a-0: @144a * // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2770E:144a-1: bdag gi lus la lhag par chags //
T02TD2770E:144a-2: nad ni rnam pa mad ldan pa'am //
T02TD2770E:144a-3: yang na bsod nams tshogs don gnyer //
T02TD2770E:144a-4: des ni lus sbyin cho ga brtsam //
T02TD2770E:144a-5: re zhig longs spyod dang lus la rmi lam dang sgyur ma lta bur rtogs shing 'du byed thams cad dri za'i grong khyer ram /
T02TD2770E:144a-6: mtshon cha'i sbyor ba lta bur yongs su shes pas //
T02TD2770E:144a-7: thog ma kho nar mchod pa rnams kyi mchog tu gyur pa ni /
T02TD2770E:144a-8: rnal 'byor gyi lus nye bar sbyin pa 'di'o //
T02TD2770E:144a-9: de nas yang rang nyid bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs rnam par dkar ba 'od zer bcu drug gi rnam pa can du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2770E:144a-10: de'i thugs ni hr'i:kun da lta bu'o //
T02TD2770E:144a-11: de las byung ba'i 'od zer 'bar ba'i gzi brjid kyis gdug pa can 'dul ba'o //
T02TD2770E:144a-12: lte bar ri dmar po las skyes pa'i me'i phreng ba gsal byed kyi 'khor lo can no //
T02TD2770E:144a-13: de bzhin du thugs kar yang aa dkar po las skyes pa'i dbyangs kyi 'khor lo yang ngo //
T02TD2770E:144a-14: mi dang lha dbang klu rgyal gyi //
T02TD2770E:144a-15: ma go gsum sgyed pu'i steng du ni //
T02TD2770E:144a-16: lha yi smin mtshams las byung ba'i //
T02TD2770E:144a-17: pha ti ka yi gri gug gis //
T02TD2770E:144a-18: bdag gi thod phyed bcad nas ni //
T02TD2770E:144a-19: phru ba'i tshul du dgab par bya //
T02TD2770E:144a-20: lha yi lte dbus ram yig las //
T02TD2770E:144a-21: me lce bskyod pa spar bar bya //
T02TD2770E:144a-22: de yi nang du bdag nyid lus //
T02TD2770E:144a-23: gcer bu tsog krung 'dug pa yin //
T02TD2770E:144b-0: gnas @144b gsum yi ge gsum bsams la //
T02TD2770E:144b-1: khu ba dmar pos bzhu bar bya //
T02TD2770E:144b-2: 'bru gsum lan gsum brjod pa yis //
T02TD2770E:144b-3: dag par byas dang bdud rtsir bya //
T02TD2770E:144b-4: phun tshogs dgyes pa'i rgyu bsams te //
T02TD2770E:144b-5: thugs ka'i hr'i:las bdud rtsi dgug / dam tshig ye shes 'dres gyur pa //
T02TD2770E:144b-6: rdo rje kha phye'i phyag rgya dang //
T02TD2770E:144b-7: aom a'a:badzra k'a ya shuddha bi shuddh'a k'a ro mu kham aa mri ta sva bh'a wa ma h'a ba lim ta p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye sh'um kha kha kh'a hi kh'a h'i /
T02TD2770E:144b-9: sngags 'dis lan gsum bar du dbul //
T02TD2770E:144b-10: mgron gsum rnal 'byor cho gas so //
T02TD2770E:144b-11: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po shr'i mee tri'i gdams pa /
T02TD2770E:144b-12: lus sbyin pa'i cho ga rdzogs so//
